tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Tough Grader (2)  Participation matters (1)
stu_tags: SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  PARTICIPATION MATTERS  TOUGH GRADER
comments: Wow, this professor was a tough one. She gets very agitated if someone is late or gets up to use the restroom. Bathroom breaks shouldn\'t be an issue. It\'s a basic human need that no one has control over. Not only is it embarrassing but it is also more disruptive to the class to be taken issue with over it than it is to just silently get up.

comments: Cool teacher that knows what she is talking about. If you want to work hard and learn a lot, take her. If you want to slack off and get an easy A, find someone else.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Tough Grader (2)  Participation matters (1)
comments: Learned a lot in this class, tests are easy she will review everything that is on the test. As long as you do your index card, hw, and study for test, you will pass wit an A. Her rule are not to be late for class and turn in assignment on time. u\'ll get the extra point for non absent and tardy. (Please write rating for other teacher to expand SAV)

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Tough Grader (2)  Participation matters (1)
comments: This teacher is extremely easy if you aren\'t a complete idiot. There is a decent amount of work and she is strict on not having any electronic devices and she tends to be a tad on the crazy side. She thinks she is hilarious and that\'s funny in and of itself. There is a lot of work but it isn\'t hard and if you attend class you get extra points.

comments: Do not take her!!!! She has the most ridiculous class rules I have ever had. She treats you like your still in grade school. She even made us come to class after we took our final..to watch a movie???
